doc.previous: Lagrange s equations can be transformed under a Legendre transformation to Hamilton s equations the Hamiltonian formulation for the equations of motion of some conjugate variables p q for example momentum p and position q is
doc.after: in the Poisson bracket notation and clearly shows the dependence of the time variation of conjugate variables p q on an energy expression  This relationship it was to be found also has corresponding forms in quantum mechanics as well as in the classical mechanics shown above These relationships bespeak a conception of time which is reversible
